newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Borsodchem's new PVC line near completion.
newsitem.headline: Borsodchem's new PVC line near completion.

text.p: Hungarian chemical company Borsodchem Rt has almost completed a 1.5 billion forint investment the test run of which occurred on Wednesday, Borsodchem said in a statement.
"As a result of an investment implemented in the polimer plant, which operates with Shin Etsu technology, the total PVC capacity rose to 250 kilotonnes from 210 kilotonnes," it said.
Borsodchem expects to reach the increased capacity in the second half of September.
"The investment, in addition to boosting PVC powder capacity, improves the company's positions in safety technology, product quality and environment," it said.
On the Budapest Stock Exchange Borsodchem shares ended at 2,810 forints, down 30.
